key_deliverables: AKS Cluster, PostgreSQL, B2C MFA Policies, Product Service CRUD, WatermelonDB Schema
demo_objectives: Show Infrastructure as Code deployment; Demonstrate B2C Login with MFA; Demonstrate Mobile App Offline DB Init
success_criteria: Terraform apply clean; B2C Token issuing claims; Mobile app DB created locally
risk_factors: Azure AD B2C complexity; Mobile DB schema validity
mitigation_strategies: Pair programming on B2C policies; Mobile schema review against backend ERD

key_deliverables: Service Request State Machine, Geo-Routing, SignalR Hub, Mobile Sync Engine, Mapbox Integration
demo_objectives: Show Mapbox rendering; Demonstrate mobile offline sync queueing; Show SignalR connection
success_criteria: Sync pushes data when online; Mapbox draws polygons; Routing logic passes tests
risk_factors: Sync conflict resolution; Geospatial query performance
mitigation_strategies: Early load testing of PostGIS; Detailed unit tests for Sync logic

epic_coverage: Core Backend, Mobile, Frontend, Security, Infrastructure
key_deliverables: Background Location Tracking, E2E Tests, DR Drill, GeoJSON Export
demo_objectives: Full E2E: Create Request -> Assign -> Technician Tracked -> Resolve
success_criteria: Travel Mode works in background; DR drill passes; 90% test coverage
risk_factors: Mobile OS killing background tasks; High capacity utilization
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize critical tasks; Push non-critical validation to Sprint 4 if needed
